about_the_game:
ExtermiHate is a top down twin stick shooter action rogue-lite where you play as Raven "Luna" Ticke. She is a lone prisoner-turned-soldier sent in to reclaim Earth from a bug invasion. Fight your way through random levels and level up your character to survive the waves and defeat the bosses.

Shortly after re-terraforming it we found out what lurked beneath. Forced to leave and regroup we are now ready to go back and fight for our new home. The issue is the powers that be only want to send criminals to do their dirty work.



You play as Raven Luna Ticke. One of the last ex-military criminals just crazy enough to be a one-woman-army and kill every last overgrown bug stopping humanity from taking over the planet.

Fight your way through multiple random maps with different modes like Wave and Kill All to succeed in reclaiming the planet.

ExtermiHate is a top down twin stick shooter action rogue-lite where you play as Raven "Luna" Ticke. She is a lone prisoner-turned-soldier sent in to reclaim Earth from a bug invasion. Fight your way through random levels and level up your character to survive the waves and defeat the bosses.

Shortly after re-terraforming it we found out what lurked beneath. Forced to leave and regroup we are now ready to go back and fight for our new home. The issue is the powers that be only want to send criminals to do their dirty work.



You play as Raven Luna Ticke. One of the last ex-military criminals just crazy enough to be a one-woman-army and kill every last overgrown bug stopping humanity from taking over the planet.

Fight your way through multiple random maps with different modes like Wave and Kill All to succeed in reclaiming the planet.
name: ExtermiHate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 3000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: ExtermiHate is a top down twin stick shooter action rogue-lite where you play as Raven "Luna" Ticke. She is a lone prisoner-turned-soldier send in to reclaim Earth 2 from a bug invasion. Fight your way through random levels and level up your character to survive the waves and defeat the bosses.
